IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PROVIDE FINANCIAL AND SUPPORT SERVICES FOR YOUTH VILLAGES, INC., A TENNESSEE NON-PROFIT CORPORATION.
IRS990.MissionDesc: PROVIDE FINANCIAL AND SUPPORT SERVICES FOR YOUTH VILLAGES, INC.
IRS990.Desc: THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDES FINANCIAL AND SUPPORT SERVICES FOR YOUTH VILLAGES, INC., A TENNESSEE NON-PROFIT CORPORATION. THE ORGANIZATION DOES NOT HAVE ANY PROGRAM SERVICES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: YOUTH VILLAGES FOUNDATION IS A SUPPORTING ORGANIZATION OF YOUTH VILLAGES, INC. YOUTH VILLAGES FOUNDATION PROVIDES FUNDS AS NEEDED TO SUPPORT THE WORK OF YOUTH VILLAGES, INC.
THE CHAIRMAN OF THE BOARD AND THE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE REVIEW THE CEO AND OFFICER LEVEL OF COMPENSATION ANNUALLY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COPY OF FORM 990 IS PROVIDED TO THE AUDIT COMMITTEE AND REVIEWED BY THE CEO AND CFO PRIOR TO FILING AND TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS SUBSEQUENT TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH BOARD MEMBER, OFFICER, AND DIRECTOR MUST SIGN A CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENT DISCLOSING INFORMATION THAT COULD BE CONSTRUED AS A CONFLICT OF INTEREST. THESE STATEMENTS ARE REVIEWED ANNUALLY BY THE OFFICERS OF THE BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE COMPENSATION COMITTEE MEETS EVERY THREE YEARS TO PROVIDE OVERSIGHT AND DIRECTION REGARDING COMPENSATION FOR EACH OF THE ORGANIZATION'S OFFICERS. AT THAT TIME AN INDEPENDENT THIRD PARTY CONSULTANT PRESENTS SALARY DATA FOR EACH OF THE JOB FUNCTIONS. THE COMPENSATION COMITTEE THEN REVIEWS THE DATA, DELIBERATES, AND SETS THE SALARY RANGES FOR EACH OFFICER TO BE USED GOING FORWARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC ON THE ORGANIZATION'S WEBSITE AND UPON REQUEST.
THE PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
